title: JollyGood
author: JollyGood
created_time: March 18, 2023, 12:07:34 PMLast edit: April 20, 2023, 02:44:01 PM by JollyGood
content: self-moderated to keep this thread clean from trolls, attention-seekers and signature spammersJOLLYGOOD PRESENTS FREE LOTTERY #3 in association with proud sponsors Utopia in association with proud sponsors Igebotz The Prize Fund Is $25 $50 THE WINNER RECEIVES $50 in BITCOINcourtesy of Utopia and Igebotz Management ServicesFA Cup Semi-FinalsBrighton and Hove Albion vs Manchester United  Saturday 22nd April 2023Manchester City vs Sheffield United Sunday 23rd April 2023===============1: which teams will reach the final (points only awarded if both teams correctly selected)3 points2: how many yellow cards in total will be shown in the semi-finals3 points3: how many red cards in total will be shown in the semi-finals1 point4: how many goals in total will be scored in the semi-finals (including extra-time and penalties)5 points5: select one option – how many semi-finals will end without extra-time or penalties (0, 1 or 2)2 points6: select one option - how many goals in total will be disallowed by VAR in the semi-finals (0, 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5+)4 points7: how many penalties will be awarded in total in the semi-finals (90 mins and extra-time only)1 pointAt the end of the count, if you have more points than any other entrant you will win $25 courtesy of Utopia.If there is more than one winner because the points are equal, the one with the most correct guesses (from the seven above) will win the $25 and in the event after that if there is a draw then the prize fund will be shared equally.The winner will receive $25 courtesy of Utopiaand$25 courtesy of ♐Igebotz Management Services ♒ ===============Here is an example of what your entries should look like:1: Brighton and Hove Albion and Sheffield United2: 153: 34: 265: 26: 5+7: 4===============Please Note:i) This is supposed to be a free competition for fun and light entertainment, if you have ulterior motives you are not welcome in this thread and your posts will be deleted. Only one entry per member. Duplicate applications will result in removal/exclusion from the free competitionii) This is a free competition open to all ranks. I am even willing to allow some newbies to apply. If you have received negative trust (or neutral trust with negative connotations) from me, your entry will be rejected. If you received negative trust from other members you can still apply and your application will be looked at and a decision made after thatiii) If you are on my ignore list or if you are a troll or attention-seeker or simply an obnoxious presence in the forum or in my opinion untrustworthy or if you are someone promoting scams, I reserve the right to refuse your entryiv) All spam and nonsensical posts will be deleted in order to keep this thread on-topicAny tips you would like to send to me for creating this competition will be appreciated: bc1qsfdtyzx0rs3ta68xw4wrygh2w32rulf379d057===============THANK YOU UTOPIAUtopia have sponsored this thread and made $25 available for the prize fund. Please download the Utopia ecosystem and check out the benefits it offers such as:= encrypted file transfers= secure chats= and much moreThey also operate Crypton Exchange which is a no-KYC exchange. Please check it out. ===============THANK YOU ♐Igebotz Management Services ♒♐Igebotz Management Services ♒ have sponsored this thread and made $25 available for the prize fund. Please check out the services Igebotz has on offer.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Where are instructions how to make predictions?

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on March 18, 2023, 09:22:48 PMWhere are instructions how to make predictions?Probably you have not gone to the details of the post. In the post, you can see that full instructions should be updated once the semifinal ended. Once the semi-final is ended team for the final race will be selected. And then anyone can be able to take part in a team. Please see the quote below:Quote from: JollyGood on March 18, 2023, 12:07:34 PMOnce the semi-final fixtures have been announced, this thread will accept entries for the competition and will explain full rules of entry.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.created_time: March 19, 2023, 02:25:37 PMLast edit: March 19, 2023, 02:36:00 PM by JollyGood
comments.body: Thank you shasan for addressing the question asked by notblox1.Manchester City qualified for the semi-final yesterday after they beat Burnley. Sheffield United have qualified today after they beat Blackburn Rovers therefore these are the two confirmed semi-finalists. We are now waiting for the results in the other two games taking place today (Brighton and Hove Albion vs Grimsby Town and also Manchester United vs Fulham)Later this evening the FA Cup semi-finals draw will be made, I will update the thread either this evening or tomorrow with full instructions on how to participate in the competition. I hope it will be as fun and active as the other lottery and competition threads were:Win c.$50 on Free Lottery#1 JollyGood-Ratimov-Utopia: Fury vs UsykSPONSORED BY UTOPIA: $25 prize in the Carabao Cup Final competitionA special thank you has to be given to Utopia for making the prize funds available and also to Ratimov who has added his personal money to increase the prize fund for the Fury vs Usyk competition thread.Quote from: shasan on March 18, 2023, 10:46:49 PMQuote from: notblox1 on March 18, 2023, 09:22:48 PMWhere are instructions how to make predictions?Probably you have not gone to the details of the post. In the post, you can see that full instructions should be updated once the semifinal ended. Once the semi-final is ended team for the final race will be selected. And then anyone can be able to take part in a team. Please see the quote below:Quote from: JollyGood on March 18, 2023, 12:07:34 PMOnce the semi-final fixtures have been announced, this thread will accept entries for the competition and will explain full rules of entry.

comments.body: These are the semi-final fixtures to be played on Saturday 22nd April:Brighton and Hove Albion vs Manchester UnitedManchester City vs Sheffield United The $25 in Bitcoin prize will be paid out to the winner of the competition before the FA Cup final takes place as this competition is about trying to accurate guess the correct statistics of the semi-finals.Hopefully the OP will be updated within a couple of hours with full information about how to enter.OP has been updated with full instructions on how to enter the free competition
